批量查询微步标签(包含微步用户信息)¶

微步标签查询¶

  • POST /providedata/search/xtb/tags/

  • 请求参数:

    {
    "ips": # IP | json | 必填 | 数组长度: 0<ips<=1000
    [
        "209.141.37.3",
        "112.85.48.3",
        "139.196.106.181",
        "218.59.220.184",
        "120.85.118.134",
        "120.85.112.18"
        ...
    ]
}

  • 响应结果:

    {
"success": true,
"data": {
    "209.141.37.3": [
        "扫描",
        "垃圾邮件"
    ],
    "112.85.48.3": [
        "动态IP"
    ],
    "139.196.106.181": [
        "傀儡机",
        "IDC服务器",
        "垃圾邮件"
    ],
    "218.59.220.184": [
        "傀儡机",
        "扫描",
        "动态IP",
        "垃圾邮件"
    ],
    "120.85.118.134": [
        "傀儡机",
        "动态IP",
        "垃圾邮件"
    ],
    "120.85.112.18": [
        "傀儡机",
        "动态IP",
        "垃圾邮件"
    ],
    ...
}

新增微步用户信息¶

  • POST /providedata/xbt/user/

  • 请求参数:

    {
"username": "xxxxxxx.qq.com", # 微步用户名 | email | 必填
"password": "xxxxxxx", # 微步密码 | str | 必填
"cookies": "cookies"  # 微步登陆后的cookies | str | 必填
}

  • 响应结果:

    {
    "code": 200,
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "id": 4,
        "insert_tm": "2021-07-12 09:55:31",
        "update_tm": "2021-07-12 09:55:31",
        "username": "xxxxxxx.qq.com",
        "password": "xxxxxxx",
        "status": "未知",
        "cookies": "cookies",
        "api_limit": 50,
        "api_remaining": 50,
        "api_reset_at": "2021-07-12 09:55:31",
        "error_num": 0,
        "status_change_at": "2021-07-12 09:55:31"
    }
}

查询微步用户信息¶

  • GET /providedata/xbt/user/?page=1&page_size=1

  • 请求参数:

    None

  • 响应结果:

    {
    "count": 2,
    "next": "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/providedata/xbt/user/?page=2&page_size=1",
    "previous": null,
    "results": [
        {
            "id": 4,
            "insert_tm": "2021-07-12 09:55:31",
            "update_tm": "2021-07-12 09:55:31",
            "username": "xxxxxxx.qq.com",
            "password": "xxxxxxx",
            "status": "未知",
            "cookies": "cookies",
            "api_limit": 50,
            "api_remaining": 50,
            "api_reset_at": "2021-07-12 09:55:31",
            "error_num": 0,
            "status_change_at": "2021-07-12 09:55:31"
        }
    ]
}

修改微步用户信息¶

  • PUT /providedata/xbt/user/<(?P<pk>[0-9]+)>/

  • 请求参数:

    {
    "username": "xxxxxxx.qq.com",
    "password": "xxxxxxx",
    "cookies": "cookies",
    "api_remaining": 23,  # 微步用户名 | int | 选填
}

  • 参数说明:

    为局部更新，参数均为选填参数！

  • 响应结果:

    {
"code": 200,
"success": true,
"data": {
    "id": 1,
    "insert_tm": "2021-07-12 09:52:56",
    "update_tm": "2021-07-12 10:07:38",
    "username": "xxxxxxx.qq.com",
    "password": "xxxxxxx",
    "status": "未知",
    "cookies": "cookies",
    "api_limit": 50,
    "api_remaining": 23,
    "api_reset_at": "2021-07-12 09:52:56",
    "error_num": 0,
    "status_change_at": "2021-07-12 09:52:56"
    }
}

删除微步用户信息¶

  • DELETE /providedata/xbt/user/<(?P<pk>[0-9]+)>/

  • 请求参数:

    None

  • 响应结果:

    {
    "code": 200,
    "success": true,
    "data": []
}
